summary: 2006 FORD F-150. CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO REAR END OVERHAUL BEARINGS REPAIR *TGW  THE CONSUMER STATED THE REAR PINION SEALS WERE REPLACED TWO YEARS AGO.  THE CONSUMER BELIEVED THERE WAS SOMETHING WRONG WITH THE QUALITY OF WORK OR THERE WAS A MANUFACTURING DEFECT.  THE DEALER AND FORD HAVE AGREED TO CUT THE BILL IN HALF TO $650. *JB
